LanguageData.EM_MilkingPump.description: Hand pump for milking, can increase milking speed and yield
LanguageData.EM_MilkingElectric.description: Electric pump for milking. When powered, it can increase milking speed, and will always yield products. Can be used by non-humans
LanguageData.EM_Prolactin.description: Increases lactation; effect and duration scale with severity. High tolerance reduces effect and accelerates daily severity decay.
LanguageData.EM_Lucilactin.description: Four times the base effect of Prolactin; one dose causes permanent-grade lactation and direct addiction. Requires regular use to satisfy need.
